SEARCH
Package edu.university.go.game

Class EnhancedGameController

java.lang.Object
edu.university.go.game.EnhancedGameController
public class EnhancedGameController extends Object
Controller for managing the state of a Go game with enhanced features: - Ko rule enforcement - Score calculation with komi - Captured stones tracking - Game end conditions (two consecutive passes or resignation)
